definitions.definition: A town in Dumfries and Galloway council area, Scotland , and the former county town of Dumfriesshire ( OS grid ref NX9776 ) .
A community and parish in York County , New Brunswick , Canada .
A town in Prince William County , Virginia , United States .

main_definition: A town in Dumfries and Galloway council area, Scotland , and the former county town of Dumfriesshire ( OS grid ref NX9776 ) .
secondary_definitions: A community and parish in York County , New Brunswick , Canada .
A town in Prince William County , Virginia , United States .
